original_title: Window Shoppin (in the fall of Babylon)
overview: Nothing is not; on behalf of human rot, this notâ€™s a mental map. You can stroll through with eyes ablaze by scorching sun that spreads the waves of city smog, LED light fog, and Christmas luminescence on dead presidents with no essence. Just fluorescence, as the gas builds up, and the homeless walk through a fascist dump.
title: Window Shoppin (in the fall of Babylon)
